Label: ATXN3
Comment: Burnett et al. also found that ataxin-3 interacts with HDAC6 and dynein motor

Label: GSK3B
Comment: GSK3b was found to co-localize with HDAC6 in hippocampal neurons, and inhibition of GSK3b resulted in decreased binding of antibody to phosphoserine-22, a potential GSK3b phosphorylation site in HDAC6.. We also provide evidence that GSK3b may directly regulate HDAC6.

Label: CSNK2B

Only CK2 holoenzyme was found to be associated with HDAC6, whereas CK2Î± and CK2Î² alone failed to precipitate with HDAC6, indicating that the CK2 holoenzyme associates with HDAC6

Label: GARS1
Comment: Interestingly, pulldown experiments showed that HDAC6 can co-immunoprecipitate with HSPB1 (CMT2E) (Zhang et al., 2007), but also with GlyRS (CMT2D)

Label: DNAJA1
Comment: Proteomic identification and functional characterization of MYH9, Hsc70, and DNAJA1 as novel substrates of HDAC6 deacetylase activity

Label: SMAD7
